name: Super Anti-Aging Eye Serum
categories: Skincare, Eye Care, Eye Creams & Treatments
about: What it is: A high-performance eye serum that visibly depuffs, brightens, and refreshes, leaving skin hydrated, smooth, and plump-looking...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dark Circles, and Puffiness..Formulation: Lightweight Serum..Highlighted Ingredients:- Polysaccharides: Visibly diminish dark circles for a brighter appearance..- Red Algae Extract: Reduces the appearance of eye bags and puffiness..- Purslane Extract: Soothes irritation and visibly refreshes the eye area...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also gluten-free and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This powerful serum visibly brightens dark circles, reduces signs of fatigue, and minimizes fine lines in as few as 28 days for brighter-, fresher-, more youthful-looking eyes.
ingredients: -Polysaccharides: Visibly diminish dark circles for a brighter appearance..-Red Algae Extract: Reduces the appearance of eye bags and puffiness..-Purslane Extract: Soothes irritation and visibly refreshes the eye area...Aqua/Water/Eau, Betaine, Lactobacillus/Portulaca Oleracea Ferment Extract, Glycerin, Calanthe Discolor Extract, Saccharomyces Cerevisiae Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Jania Rubens Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Panthenol, Xanthan Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin, Gluconolactone, Sodium Carrageenan, Pantolactone, Sodium Benzoate, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Calcium Gluconate.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use daily, AM and PM..-Dispense one to two drops onto your ring finger..-Gently pat around eyes..-Follow with Dr. Barbara Sturm’s Eye Cream and Face Cream (each sold separately)..-You can store this serum in the refrigerator and apply it cold to enhance its refreshing effects.

reviews.review_title: Wonderful serum, but much better serums available
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye serum is great. but so are the Biossance & Lancôme Génifique Yeux Light-Pearl eye serums. Having bought, used & compared all 3 products, I've ranked them for how they worked for my skin. You get the same exact amount of the Lancôme eye serum for $80, as you do the Dr. Sturm, which is $300. I have much better results with the Lancôme than the Dr. Sturm. The Biossance eye gel I believe has a bit  more product, it's $56, & I have much better results with the Biossance than the Dr. Sturm. Out of the 3, & for my skin, the Lancôme is the superior product. Biossance comes in at a clos3 2nd & Dr. Sturm comes in at a close 3rd. I used each product for 3 or 4 months, & taking the cost out of it, I've ranked these for how well they worked for my skin. Others may have better results with Dr. Sturm, but if you give this one a whirl, maybe test your favorite eye serum(s) against this one & see which one works best for you & your skin. You may end up saving yourself a whole lot of money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dr. Barbara Sturm's Super Anti-Aging Eye Serum is a game-changer in the world of skincare. As a skincare enthusiast, I've tried countless eye serums claiming to reverse signs of aging, but none have impressed me quite like this one.  Firstly, let's talk about the formulation. Dr. Barbara Sturm is renowned for her innovative approach to skincare, and this serum is no exception. Packed with powerful ingredients like Purslane, Skullcap, and Golden Root, it's designed to target fine lines, wrinkles, and puffiness around the delicate eye area. What's more, it's infused with hydrating and soothing agents like Hyaluronic Acid and Red Algae Extract, ensuring your skin feels nourished and refreshed with every application. Plus, a little goes a long way, so you can enjoy long-lasting results without having to constantly repurchase.  In terms of results, I've been blown away by the transformation in my under-eye area since incorporating this serum into my routine. Not only have my fine lines visibly diminished, but my skin looks brighter, firmer, and more rejuvenated overall. Plus, the cooling sensation upon application is a welcome treat, especially on tired mornings.  While the price point may be on the higher end, I firmly believe that investing in quality skincare is worth every penny. With Dr. Barbara Sturm's Super Anti-Aging Eye Serum, you're not just buying a product – you're investing in the health and vitality of your skin. reviews.review_text: The serum has a silky, lightweight texture that glides smoothly onto the skin. It feels incredibly hydrating without being greasy or heavy. Right after applying the serum, you may notice a cooling and slightly tightening sensation around the eye area. This can be quite invigorating, especially in the morning or after a long day. The skin appears slightly more plump and hydrated, reducing the appearance of fine lines and puffiness almost immediately. With consistent use, the benefits become more pronounced. The eye area looks smoother, with a noticeable reduction in fine lines and wrinkles. Dark circles and puffiness are significantly diminished, giving the eyes a more rested and youthful appearance. The skin also feels firmer and more resilient. After incorporating this serum into a regular skincare routine, the overall appearance of the eye area is greatly improved. The delicate skin around the eyes looks brighter and more even-toned. There's a subtle but definite lifting effect that makes the eyes appear more open and awake. The Dr. Barbara Sturm Super Anti-Aging Eye Serum is an investment, but it delivers impressive results that justify its high price tag. It's particularly effective for those looking to address multiple signs of aging around the eyes, including wrinkles, puffiness, and dark circles. If you’re seeking a potent and luxurious eye serum that delivers visible improvements, this product is definitely worth considering.

reviews.review_title: Just what my under eye area needed !
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Today, I'm diving deep into the skincare world to share my latest obsession : Dr. Barbara Sturm’s Super Anti-Aging Eye Serum. If you’re like me and constantly battling dark circles, puffiness, and fine lines, this might just be your new best friend. First of all, this eye serum is a lifesaver for anyone dealing with tired eyes and those pesky signs of aging. The formulation is lightweight and feels so luxurious on the skin. It’s designed for all skin types—whether you’re oily, dry, or somewhere in between, this serum has got you covered. What really sets this serum apart are the powerhouse ingredients. Polysaccharides work their magic to visibly diminish dark circles, giving you that brighter, well-rested look. Red algae extract is a hero ingredient for reducing puffiness and eye bags, which I’ve definitely noticed after those late nights. And let’s not forget the purslane extract—it’s super soothing and leaves the eye area feeling refreshed and calm. One of the things I love most about this serum is how quickly it works. In just a few weeks, I’ve seen a significant reduction in fine lines and an overall brighter, more youthful look around my eyes. It’s like a mini facelift in a bottle! Plus, it’s packed with hyaluronic acid, which keeps the skin hydrated and plump, tackling that loss of firmness we all dread. Using it is a breeze. I apply it daily, both in the morning and at night. Just a drop or two on my ring finger, gently patting around my eyes, and I’m good to go. Pro tip: keep it in the fridge for an extra cooling, depuffing effect. Trust me, it feels incredible, especially first thing in the morning. I also appreciate that this serum is free from all the nasties—no parabens, formaldehydes, phthalates, and a bunch of other stuff we don’t want on our skin. It’s also gluten-free and cruelty-free, aligning perfectly with my values. Dr. Barbara Sturm’s Super Anti-Aging Eye Serum is a must-have in any skincare routine if you’re serious about tackling dark circles.

reviews.review_text: I’m not sure I’m super impressed with this brand. The product doesn’t really match the price. It’s super expensive and doesn’t give phenomenal results. It does feel really nice on the skin but it honestly did nothing for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed using this serum under my eyes. After two weeks of consistent use, I was able to see improvement in fine lines and wrinkles on the sides of my eyes, and also see some improvement in my under eye bags. In terms of texture, I like that it is lightweight, but it had a slightly sticky feeling on my fingers after application. It absorbed pretty fast after only one or two drops of use for both under eye areas. Overall, I would give us a solid four out of five.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Skincare going into my 30’s is a must especially under eye creams ! I’m so glad I found this it has been helping me a lot especially with dark undertone, dull like skin , and a little wrinkles ! It also helps keep that area hydrated

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this anti-aging eye cream. I love the applicator, a dropper bottle. It helps you to get out the perfect amount of product. The product itself has helped a lot with fine lines and my dark under eyes. I have been using this over all my other eye creams lately!

reviews.review_text: So far I’m really liking this eye serum! The formula isn’t sticky and absorbs really nicely into the skin. It’s very hydrating, and I look forward to seeing what long term use of this product will do!

reviews.review_text: I have loved every single product I have tried by this brand, and the super anti aging eye serum is no exception. I’m in my 30’s, and small signs of aging are starting to show. Just after using it for a couple of weeks, I can see that my under eyes are super hydrated and makeup applies really well. If tiny crows feet and puffy eyes are your ginger , then I highly recommend trying this serum!

I am always excited to try Dr. Barbara Sturm skincare , so of course I had tried this eye serum and it didn’t disappoint. It is a lightweight eye serum and it is very easy to apply the proper amount with the dropper. A little goes along way and it is easy to apply more if needed. this is a very lightweight product, but it gives good hydration and it spreads on the skin well. It gives long lasting results and my undereyes hydrated, plump and glowy. It has no scent and I really appreciate that for the delicate eye area. This is a perfect eye product for summer.
